text: The Spokane Chiefs are an American professional ice hockey team that began playing in 1985. They currently play in the Western Hockey League. They play their home games in Spokane, Washington at the Spokane Veterans Memorial Arena. The were known as the Kelowna Wings from 1982 to 1985 until they relocated to Spokane and became the Chiefs. The Chiefs were also the first team in WHL history to host an outdoor hockey game when they defeated the Kootenay Ice 11-2 on January 15, 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1985 establishments in the United States Category:Canadian Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Western Hockey League Category:Sports in Washington (state) Category:Spokane, Washington Category:1980s establishments in Washington (state)
title: Spokane Chiefs
